description:
Job Description

  • The HR Services team performs tens of thousands of transactions a year and is currently seeking an energetic person, who can perform tens of thousands of transactions a year with excellence, autonomy, flexibility, and accuracy.
  • Someone who thrives in a fast-paced, high volume, short deadline environment
  • Someone who enjoys data entry and transactional work.
  • Someone who feels accomplished when delivering accurate and complete responses.
  • Someone who takes pride in being responsive and organized.
  • Someone who can follow written and verbal instructions.
  • Someone who is detail oriented and has the ability to self-audit.
  • A flexible work environment, remote work >100% of the time. Ability to work on-site as needed (not expected to be very often).
  • Accommodating work schedules to create a work/life balance.
  • Remote training with team Technical Lead.
  • Cross-training with Sr. Specialists
  • 90-day planning for work assignments to accommodate Ad Hoc work.
  • Experience partnering with cross-functional teams and all HR Centers of Excellence (COE)
  • A dynamic team of professional HR Specialists who perform the same work.
  • 100% inclusion to bring 100% of yourself to work.

Basic Qualifications

  • Demonstrated attention to detail while completing large volume transactions with a low error rate.
  • Exhibited growth mindset/continuous process improvement.
  • Virtual Customer Service experience.
  • Capability to perform data analysis/interpretation.
  • Displayed prioritization, organization, planning, and communication skills.
  • Must Have previous experience working with Represented Labor contracts (Unions)
  • Minimum Intermediate level Excel experience (Pivot tables, vertical look ups, basic formulas)
  • Desire and attention to detail for Data Entry and manual transaction execution
  • Previous experience in large enterprise environment
  • Previous Microsoft Office 365 (Teams, Excel, PowerPoint, Word, One Note) Specifically.

Desired Qualifications

  • Human Resources/Labor Relations Experience
  • Experience working with cross-functional teams and/or stakeholders virtually and across multiple sites.
  • Demonstrated knowledge of Peoplesoft tool (HRMS) and/or SAP Success Factors.
  • Knowledge of working in a large-scale Union environment.
  • Ability to function with accuracy during extensive, on-going, changes in the way the work is completed.
